setting.location: Laboratory filled with experimental apparatus, final attempt at breakthrough discovery
setting.weather: Dark night with only laboratory flames providing light

characters.appearance: Middle-aged man, 40s, completely absorbed in scientific work, clothes disheveled, face illuminated by chemical flames
characters.clothing: White shirt with sleeves rolled up, dark trousers, leather apron stained with chemical burns, no jacket
characters.position: Standing before complex experimental apparatus, completely focused on achieving scientific breakthrough
characters.action: Conducting crucial experiment with dangerous chemicals, seeking discovery that might redeem his failures

characters.appearance: Young man, late 20s, intellectual appearance, concerned expression, watching from doorway
characters.clothing: Simple dark jacket, white shirt, practical clothing of dedicated scientist
characters.position: Standing in laboratory doorway, observing mentor's dangerous experimentation

scene.mainElements: Complex laboratory setup with glass tubes, metal apparatus, chemical flames creating dramatic lighting, dangerous experiments in progress with volatile substances
scene.details: Elaborate distillation equipment with glass tubing connecting multiple vessels, chemical flames of different colors producing dramatic light and shadows, volatile liquids bubbling and steaming, precise scientific instruments for measurement, notebooks filled with calculations and observations, chemical burns and stains on work surfaces
scene.background: Laboratory shelves with chemical bottles and scientific equipment, charts and diagrams covering walls, window showing dark night outside
scene.atmosphere: Desperate attempt to achieve scientific immortality, dangerous experimentation driven by need to create something lasting, mentorship between generations of scientists, tension between breakthrough and catastrophe, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot showing both the experimenting scientist and concerned observer
composition.focus: The dangerous chemical apparatus and the risk being taken for potential discovery
composition.depth: Foreground: chemical flames and apparatus, middle: intense scientist at work, background: younger scientist watching from doorway
